page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT IN THE DYKE AREA
page.content: There are 41 families in Dyke Primary School.37 fathers work.41% of then work on agricultural land,7% are Builders,7% work in transport business,2% work in Education,10% do a service ,2% are working in communication,10% work on oil rigs and 10% work as mechanics.Only 10% are unemployed.21% of the fathers work in the Dyke area 40% are in the school cathment area and 39% work outwith the school catchment area. Only 36% of the mothers with children in the school are working.3 work in the area 6 in the school catchment and 6 outwith the catchment area.3 of the mothers work with children,1 is a secretary,2 are nurses,1 a health assistant,3 are domestic,2 work in management and 3 in a service indusrtry.
